item.title: Start de creation form
item.description:
Next click repeatedly on:
>The menu « File »
>On « New »
>On « Project »
>On the file « Convertigo Project »
>On the file « Web clipping »
>On the file « Web Clipping »
>Sur "Next"
You can realise these instructions manually (Click on "Click to skip") or automatically(Click on "Click to perform").

item.title: Follow the instructions in the form
item.description:
>Give a name to your project
>Click on "Next"
>Click on "Next"
>Put the l'address of the web site server (address until'au "/") to treat in the field "HTTP Serveur". This address needs to start with www
To eventually complete the address of the web site, go to the tab Projects view, click on the sign "+" of the project du projet followed by "+" of the file "connector". Click on the connector that appeared.
In the tab properties view change the propriaty "Root Path" and put the rest of the site address by commencing with a "/"
